comment: Equivalence for substitution when ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` . The implication "to the left" is ~ sb2 and does not require the non-freeness hypothesis. Theorem ~ sb6 replaces the non-freeness hypothesis with a disjoint variable condition. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)
